content.raw:
I'm trying to build sdformat-3.6.0 on Fedora 23, and I noticed the INTEGRATION_nested_model test is failing.  gtest output:

```
$ ./test/integration/INTEGRATION_nested_model
Running main() from gtest_main.cc
[==========] Running 2 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 2 tests from NestedModel
[ RUN      ] NestedModel.NestedModel
Warning [parser.cc:766] XML Element[model], child of element[model] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[model]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.
/home/rich/Source/sdformat-3.6.0/test/integration/nested_model.cc:71: Failure
Value of: modelElem->HasElement("model")
  Actual: false
Expected: true
Error [Element.cc:683] Missing element description for [model]
INTEGRATION_nested_model: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:648: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = sdf::Element; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = sdf::Element*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
```

It looks like sdf/1.5/model.sdf contains a description for nested models, so I'm not sure what's going on here.
content.html:
I'm trying to build sdformat-3.6.0 on Fedora 23, and I noticed the INTEGRATION_nested_model test is failing. gtest output:

$ ./test/integration/INTEGRATION_nested_model
Running main() from gtest_main.cc
[==========] Running 2 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 2 tests from NestedModel
[ RUN      ] NestedModel.NestedModel
Warning [parser.cc:766] XML Element[model], child of element[model] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[model]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.
/home/rich/Source/sdformat-3.6.0/test/integration/nested_model.cc:71: Failure
Value of: modelElem->HasElement("model")
  Actual: false
Expected: true
Error [Element.cc:683] Missing element description for [model]
INTEGRATION_nested_model: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:648: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = sdf::Element; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = sdf::Element*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)

It looks like sdf/1.5/model.sdf contains a description for nested models, so I'm not sure what's going on here.
